name: Lunges
details: Promoting functional movement while also increasing strength in your legs and glutes.

name: Pushups
details: Pushups are one of the most basic yet effective bodyweight moves you can perform because of the number of muscles that are recruited to perform them.

name: Squats
details: Squats increase lower body and core strength, as well as flexibility in your lower back and hips.

name: Standing overhead dumbbell presses
details: Compound exercises, which utilize multiple joints and muscles, are perfect for busy bees as they work several parts of your body at once.

name: Single-leg deadlifts
details: Single-leg deadlifts require stability and leg strength. Grab a light to moderate dumbbell to complete this move.

name: Dumbbell rows
details: Not only will these make your back look killer in that dress, but dumbbell rows are also another compound exercise that strengthens multiple muscles in your upper body.

name: Burpees
details: Burpees are a super-effective, whole-body move that provides great bang for your buck for cardiovascular endurance and muscle strength.

name: Side planks
details: A healthy body requires a strong core at its foundation, so donâ€™t neglect core-specific moves like the side plank.

name: Planks
details: Planks are an effective way to target both your abdominal muscles and your whole body.
